item.title: China Shifts to Stimulus Mode With Xi's Options Dwindling
item.description: China Shifts to Stimulus Mode With Xi’s Options Dwindling China’s economy is slowing down, and the government is running out of options to stimulate growth. The government has cut interest rates and increased spending, but these measures have not been enough to prevent the economy from slowing down.
